thread.title: Drew Brees' 400th TD wins game for Saints in overtime vs. Cowboys
thread.title_full: Drew Brees' 400th TD wins game for Saints in overtime vs. Cowboys - CBSSports.com

author: Sean Wagner-McGough
title: Drew Brees' 400th TD wins game for Saints in overtime vs. Cowboys
text:
Only a week after Tom Brady became the fourth quarterback to throw for 400 touchdowns, Saints quarterback Drew Brees cleared the same hurdle, joining Brady, Peyton Manning , Brett Favre and Dan Marino in the 400-touchdown club. On Sunday night against the Cowboys , Brees tossed his 400th touchdown.
And it came in spectacular fashion, as Brees connected with C.J. Spiller on the second play of overtime to win the game for the Saints just moments after they missed a field goal at the end of regulation.
This is what a 80-yard, overtime, walk-off TD for your 400th career TD pass looks like. Take a bow, Drew #DALvsNO http://t.co/ekVfR85IH3 
â€” NFL (@NFL) October 5, 2015 In the first quarter, Brees, dealing with a shoulder injury, found Josh Hill on a 3-yard pass to get touchdown No. 399. The touchdown also gave Brees the 5,000th completion of his career, good enough for the third most in the history of the league.
It took longer for Brees to nab touchdown No. 400. But in overtime, a 20-yard pass to Spiller turned into a game-winning, 80-yard touchdown.

Drew Brees became the fifth quarterback to reach 400 touchdown passes. (USATSI) 
Topics: C.J. Spiller , Drew Brees , Josh Hill , Peyton Manning , Tom Brady , Dallas Cowboys , New Orleans Saints , NFL
